Ibitiyo jarara gol me jabu pyerabic me ribo dog boŋo cuka i kom lawote pi golo wad i wek kema obed mukubbe kacel likiŋ.
“Ibit iyo cuka me yer dyegi me laum wi kema; ibitimo cuka apar wiye acel.
Bor cuka acel acel obed ma romo yadi apar wiye abic, ki lac me cuka acel acel obed ma romo yadi aryo; cuka apar wiye acel-li ducu gubed marom.
Ibiribo cuka abic kacel pat kengi, ki cuka abicel bene ibiribo pat kengi, dok cuka me abicelle ibibamo idolo iye aryo i nyim kema.
Kwo waŋ jarara pyerabic i dog cuka me dul mukwoŋo me agikki, ka dok ikwo waŋ jarara pyerabic i dog cuka me dul me aryone me agikk i.
“Dok ibitiyo lagol me mola me aroya i waŋ jarara, irib ki kema, wek obed mukubbe kacel likiŋ.
Dul cuka me kema ma odon, en nucu cuka mudoŋŋe, bipyelle i ŋe kema.
Futi acel ki nucu tuŋ cel ki futi acel ki nucu tuŋ cel bene, en bor me cuka mudoŋŋe, bipyelle i but kema tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi me umone.
Dok ikwo laa romo ma ginyoŋo, ki laa dyegi me umo wi kema.
“Ibitiyo guti me bao yat lalwii, ma ocun atir, pi kema.
Bor gut i obed futi apar wiye abic ki lacce futi aryo, i kom guti acel acel.
Wek tyene aryo i kom guti acel acel, me kubogi kacel; ibitiyo guti me kema ducu kit meno.
Ibitiyo guti me kema, guti pyeraryo i tuŋ acuc;
dok ibitiyo tedi tergi me ryal ma romo pyeraŋwen pi guti pyeraryo-nu, tedi tere aryo pi guti acel pi tyene aryo, ki tedi tere aryo pi guti mu kene pi tyene aryo.
Ki pi kema tuŋ me aryone, ma tuŋ acam, obed guti pyeraryo,
ki tedi tergi me ryal ma romo pyeraŋwen, tedi tere aryo pi guti acel, ki tedi tere aryo pi guti mukene.
Ki pi ne kema ma tuŋ potoceŋ bene iti guti abicel.
Ti guti aryo me twok kema ma i ŋeye;
gibipoko kingi ki tuŋ piny ento giribo doggi ki tuŋ wigi malo i kom agut mukwoŋo; gin aryo ducu gibibedo kit meno, ci twoke bibedo aryo.
Guti bibedo aboro, ki tedi tergi me ryal, tedi tergi apar wiye abicel, tedi tere aryo pi guti bao acel, ki tedi tere aryo pi gut i bao mukene.
“Dok ibitiyo rii me bao yat lalwii abic pi guti me kema tuŋ cel,
ki rii bao abic pi guti me kema tuŋ mukene, ki rii bao abic pi guti me kema me ŋeye tuŋ potoceŋ.
Rii bao ma i dyere, ma ŋolo kor guti ari, bia ki i agikk i tuŋ cel nio i agikki tuŋ mukene.
Ibimwono kom guti woko ki jabu, dok ibitiyo agit me rwako iye rii bao, ibimwono rii bao bene ki jabu.
Gur kema i kit ma yam ginyutti i wi got.
“Ibikwoyo boŋo kicika ki uci ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre; gibicweyo iye cal lukerubi ki tic me diro.
Ibiŋabo i kom wir aŋwen me bao yat lalwii ma gimwono komgi woko ki jabu, ma tye iye gol jabu, ma ocuŋ i kom tedi tergi me ryal aŋwen.
Ŋab boŋo kicika ki jarara lagolle. Kel canduk lok me caden kunnu ki i boŋo kicika, ci boŋo kicika bipoko kin kabedo maleŋ ki kabedo maleŋ makato ducu.
Ka doŋ iket kom me kica i wi canduk me cik i kabedo maleŋ makato ducu.
Ket meja ki woko i ŋe boŋo k icika, ki okar-mac iket tuŋ acuc me kema, ma okemo meja; ibiketo meja tuŋ acam.
“Dok ikwo boŋo cuka Laum doggola me kema ki uci ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre, ma gidero maber.
Ti wir abic me boŋo cuka laum doggola ki bao yat lalwii, ci imwon komgi woko ki jabu; golgi bibedo me jabu, dok ibiliyo tedi tergi me mola abic.
“Ibitiyo keno tyer ki bao yat lalwii; borre obed futi abiro ki nucu ki lacce futi abiro ki nucu. Bor keno tyer ki lacce bibedo ma rom, ki borre tuŋ malo bibedo futi aŋwen ki nucu.
Ibitimo ten keno i kom twoke aŋwen ducu; ten keno ducu gibikubbe kacel kwede, dok ibimwono kome woko ki mola.
Ibiyubo lajob burune, ki akwaya latokke, ki becen, ki gin lacob riŋo, ki weer lawaŋ mac; jami tic meno ducu ibiyubogi ki mola.
Yub keikeine bene me obwo mola, dok i twok obwo mola aŋwen-ni iket iye agit aŋwen me mola.
Ibiketo i te rii me keno tyer wek obwo obut i kor keno tyer.
Dok itim tal me keno tyer, tal me yat lalwii, ci ibimwono komgi woko ki mola.
Ibirwako tal donyo i agit ducu, wek tal orine i keno tyer tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi me latiŋŋe.
Ibitiyo keno tyer ma iye twolo, ki bao; ti macalo yam ginyutti i wi got. Dyekal me kema (Nia 38.9-20)
“Ibitiyo dyekal me kema. I tuŋ acuc me dyekal gibiŋabo iye boŋo cuka camanini ma giwiyo maberre, ma borre tuŋ cel romo yadi pyerabic.
Wir bibedo pyeraryo, ki tedi tergi bene pyeraryo, me mola, ento gol me wir ki otacgi ducu gubed me ryal.
Ki tuŋ acam bene borre obed kit meno, kunnu bene gibiŋabo iye cuka ma borre romo yadi pyerabic; wir obed pyeraryo ki tedi tergi pyeraryo, me mola, ento gol me wir ki otacgi ducu gubed me ryal.
Ki bute ma tuŋ potoceŋ dyekalle bene gibiŋabo iye boŋo cuka ma borre romo yadi pyeraryo wiye abic; wir obed apar ki tedi tergi bene obed apar.
Lac dyekal ma tuŋ nyime ma tuŋ wokceŋ biromo yadi pyeraryo wiye abic.
Gibiŋabo boŋo cuka i ŋet doggaŋ tuŋcel ma romo yadi abiro ki nucu; wir obed adek ki tedi tergi adek.
Ki tuŋ mukene bene gibiŋabo iye boŋo cuka ma romo yadi abiro ki nucu; wirgi obed adek ki tedi tergi adek.

Doggaŋ me dyekal gibiumo ki boŋo cuka ma lacce romo yadi apar ma gitiyo ki uci ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre, ma gidero maber; bibedo ki wir aŋwen ki tedi tergi aŋwen.
Wir murumo dyekal ducu bibedo iye otac me ryal; golgi bibedo me ryal, ki tedi tergi me mola.
Bor me dyekal biromo yadi pyerabic, ki lacce yadi pyeraryo wiye abic, ki borre tuŋ malo futi abiro ki nucu; gibiŋabo iye boŋo cuka camanini ma giwiyo maberre; tedi te wir bibedo me mola.
Jami tic ducu ma i kema ma konyo kwa tic ducu, kacel ki teke lagurre ducu, ki teke ma orumo dyekal ducu bibedo me mola.
“Dok ibiciko jo Icrael ducu gukel moo me nyig jeituni ma giodo, giliyo maleŋ, me menyo piny, wek giket mac laput obed ka lyel nino ducu ma pe to.

Aron ki awobene gucan mac olyel i nyim Rwot nia otyeno nio odiko, kun giketo i kema me rwatte, ki woko i ŋe boŋo kicika ma i nyim canduk lok me caden. Man bibedo cik ma jo Icrael bigwoko matwal, wa i kare pa likwayogi ducu.
“Kel omeru Aron cok boti kacel ki awobene, gua woko ki i kin jo Icrael, wek guti bota tic me ajwagi; gin ene: Aron ki awobe pe Aron, Nadab ki Abiu, Eleajar ki Itamar.
“Ibikwoyo boŋŋi maleŋ pi omeru Aron, me deyo dok mamwonya.
Dok ibiwaco bot jo makwiri ducu, ma apoŋo cwinygi ki kwiri, ni gukwo boŋo aruka pi Aron me kwero en pi tic me bedo, ajwakana.

Man aye boŋŋi aruka ma gibikwoyo: kicaa kor, epod, jor, kanyi ma giŋweko kome, kitambara adwala me wic ki kitambara latwe pyer; myero gikwogi gubed boŋŋi aruka maleŋ pi omeru Aron ki awobene pi ticgi me bedo ajwagina.
“Gibigamo jabu, uci ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre.
Gibikwoyo epod ki jabu ki uci ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre, ma gikwoyo ki diro.
Bibedo ki gin wi gwoke aryo ma gikubo i doge ryoryo, wek okubbe kacel.
Ceme ma i kome ma latwene ma gicweyo ki diro bibedo kit tic acel-lu, me jami acel-lu, en aye me jabu, uci ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre.
Ibikwanyo litino kidi onik aryo, igor nyiŋ awobe pa Icrael i komgi,
nyiŋ awobe abicel i kom kidi onik acel, ki nyiŋ awobe mudoŋŋe abicel i kom kidi onik mukene-ni, kun ilubo kit dito me anywalligi.
Macalo ladiro goro kom kidi, in bene ibigoro nyiŋ awobe pa Icrael i kom kidi aryo-nu: ibimwonogi i kom jabu ma giŋweko kome ki diro ma okwa ko tere.
Ci doŋ ibiketo litino kidi aryo meno i gin wi gwok epod, gubed kidi me po pi awobe pa Icrael; Aron bitiŋo nyiŋgi i wi gwoke aryo ducu me po pigi i nyim Rwot.
Tim gin lakwak tere ki jabu ma giŋweko kome ki diro;
dok itim nyor aryo me jabu ma giliyo maber ma giminogi macalo tol; ka imwon tol nyor meno i kom gin lakwak tere.
“Dok ibikwoyo kicaa kor me ŋolo kop ki tic me diro; ibitiyo macalo tic i kom epod; ibitimo ki jabu, ki uci ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre.
Ibibano iye aryo ma borre ki lacce rom ki dye ciŋ acel.
Ci ibimwono iye litino kidi me wel ma guryeyo tyen aŋwen. I tyeŋ mukwoŋo gibiketo iye cadiuc, topaj ki kabankel:
tyen me aryone obed emeradi, capir ki dayaman;
tyen me adekke obed jacint, agat ki ameticito;
ki tyen me aŋwenne obed berul, onik ki jacipa; gibimwonogi i jabu ma giŋweko ki diro.
Litino kidi ducu bibedo apar wiye aryo ma nyiŋ awobe pa jo Icrael gigoro i komgi; gibibedo macalo kidi ma gigoro me agit, kun acel acel tye ki nyiŋ ma gigoro i kome muporo kaka apar wiye aryo.
Tim bene nyor aryo ki jabu ma giliyo maber ma giminogi macalo tol, me tweyo kicaa kor;
ibitimo agit me jabu aryo, pi kicaa kor, ci iket agit aryo-nu i kom dog kicaa kor aryo.
Dok irwak tol jabu aryo-nu odony i agit aryo ma gitye i kom kicaa kor-ri,
ki dog tol aryo-nu ibimwonogi i kom gin lakwak tere aryo me jabu ma giŋweko ki diro-ni, me tweyo kicaa kor i gin wi gwok epod tuŋ nyime.
Dok itim agit me jabu aryo, ci iketgi i twok kicaa kor aryo ducu i kom doge ma tuŋ iye ma cok ki epod.
Tim agit jabu mukene doki, ci ikubgi i gin wi gwok epod aryo anyim tuŋ tere, ka ma okubbe tuŋ malo i wi ceme me epod ma gicweyo ki diro.
Gibitweyo kicaa kor ki agitte i kom agit me epod ki tol ma bulu, wek gitwe obut opyelle i wi ceme me epod ma gicweyo ki diro, wek kicaa kor pe ogonnye woko ki i kom epod.
Wek Aron otiŋ nyiŋ awobe pa Icrael i kicaa kor me ŋolo kop i pal cwinye i kare me donyo i kabedo maleŋ nino ducu, wek obed me po i komgi i nyim Rwot.
I kicaa kor me ŋolo kop ibiketo iye Urim ki Tumim ; gin bene gibibedo i pal cwiny Aron i kare ma en donyo i nyim Rwot; kit meno Aron bitiŋo ŋolo kop pa jo Icrael i pal cwinye nino ducu i nyim Rwot.
“Dok ibitimo jor me epod ma kome ducu obedo bulu.
Gituc doge obed twolo i dyere pi rwako wic; gibicweyo kun gidolo doge macalo dog boŋo aruka ma gidolo, orumo wo ko likiŋ, wek pe oyeci.
I dog boŋo ibiluŋo iye gin muporo okwer pomegranat munyak ma gikwoyo ki uci ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar, orum dog jor ducu, kun iŋobo kingi ki olaŋ me jabu;
olaŋ jabu ki okwer pomegranat orum dog jor ducu kun gigwennye agwenya.
Aron biruko ka donyo ka tic, ci dwan olaŋ bikok winnye i kare ma en donyo i kabedo maleŋ i nyim Rwot, ki i kare ma en kato woko, wek pe oto.
“Ibitimo akwaya jabu ma giliyo maber, ci igor i ko me macalo agora i kom agit, ni, ‘Maleŋ pi Rwot.’
Ci ibitweyo irido i kom kitambara adwala me wic-ci ki tol ma bulu; ibiketo i nyim kitambara adwala me wic.
Gibiketo cun i tur nyim Aron, ci Aron bitiŋo alii me bal pi jami maleŋ ma jo Icrael gityero me bedo motgi maleŋ; bicuŋ i tur nyime jwijwi, wek Rwot ogamgi.
“Ibicweyo kanyi ki boŋo camanini maberre ma giŋweko kome, itim kitambara me adwala i wic ki boŋo camanini maberre, ci itim bene kitambara me latwe pyer ma gidero maber.
“Pi awobe pa Aron ibikwoyo kanyi ki kitambara latwe pyer, ki gitok matino; ibitimogi obed me deyo ki mamwonya.
Ibirukogi i kom omeru Aron kacel ki awobene, ibiwirogi ki moo me ketogi i dog tic, pi kwerogi pi tic maleŋ, wek guti bota tic me ajwagi.
Dok ibikwoyo pali boŋo camanini pigi me umo komgi nia i pyergi nio i emgi.

Aron ki awo bene birukogi i kare me donyo i kema me rwatte, nyo i kare ma gicito cok ki keno tyer pi tic i kabedo maleŋ; wek pe gutiŋ alii me bal, miyo gito woko, Man bibedo cik matwal bote ki bot likwaye ma bilube.
“Man aye gin ma ibitimo i komgi ka ikwerogi, wek guti bota tic me ajwagi. Kwany wod twon acel ki nyogi romi aryo ma mwonyo pe i komgi,
ki mugati ma tobi pe iye, ki capat ma tobi pe iye ma girubo ki moo, ki capat marep ma gireyo moo i komgi; ibitimogi ki moko ŋano ma pwotte.
Ibiketogi i aduku acel, ci ikelogi ki aduku-nu, ka ikel, bene wod twon ki nyogi romi aryo.
Ibikelo Aron ki awobene i nyim doggola kema me rwatte, ci ilwok komgi woko ki pii.
Ibikwanyo boŋŋi aruka, ci iruko Aron ki kanyi, ki jor me epod, ki epod, ki kicaa kor, ci itwe pyere ki ceme me epod ma gicweyo ki diro;
ibidwalo kitambara adwala i wiye, ka iketo lakukana maleŋ cuŋ i wi kitambara adwala.
Ka ibikwanyo moo me wir, iwiro kwede.
Ka dok ibikelo awobene, irukogi ki kanyi,
ci ibitweyo pyergi ki kitambara, ka itwe gitok matino i wigi; ci tic me ajwagi bibedo megi pi cik ma bibedo matwal. Ibiketo Aron ki awobene i dog ticgi kit meno.
“Dok ibikelo twon i nyim kema me rwatte, ci Aron ki awobene gibiketo ciŋgi i wiye,
ka doŋ ibineko wod twon-nu i nyim Rwot, ki i doggola kema me rwatte.
Ibigwelo remo twon, ci ireyo remone i kom ten keno aŋwen me keno tyer ki lwet ciŋi; ki remo mudoŋŋe ibionyo i te tedi keno tyer.
Ibikwanyo dwolo ducu ma oumo jam iye, ki okene ma i kom cwiny, ki olaŋ aryo ki dwolo ma tye i komgi, ci iwaŋgi woko i wi keno tyer.
Ento riŋo wod twon-nu ki pyenne ki wee iye-gu, ibiwaŋo awaŋa ki mac wa i ŋe gony; en aye gitum me bal.
“Ka man otum ci ibikwanyo nyok romo acel imiyo Aron ki awo bene giketo ciŋgi i wiye
ci ibineko nyok romo, ibijolo remone, ci icoro remone i kom keno tyer irumo kwede kome ducu.
Dok ibiŋido riŋo nyok romo matitino ci ilwoko jam iye, ki tyene ducu, ci iketogi i kom riŋo ma giŋido-ni, kacel ki wiye,
ibiwaŋo riŋo nyok romo woko ducu ki berre i wi keno tyer; en aye gitum awaŋa bot Rwot; en aye gin ma ŋwece kur me layom cwiny, gityer ma giwaŋo ki mac bot Rwot.
“Ka lacen dok ibikwanyo nyok romo mukene; ci Aron ki awobene gibiketo ciŋgi i wiye,

ci ibineko nyok romo, igwelo remone ci ireyo i ogwilo it Aron malacuc, ki i ogwilo it awo bene malacuc, ki i kom twon nyig tyengi malacuc, ci ibicoro remo mudoŋŋe i kom keno tyer irumo kwede kome ducu.

Ka ibikwanyo remo manok ma i wi keno tyer, ki moo wir, ci ikirogi i kom Aron ki i kom boŋŋi arukane, ki i kom awobene ki i kom boŋŋi aruka pa awobene, ci en ki boŋŋi arukane gibibedo maleŋ, kacel ki awobene ki boŋŋi arukagi bene.

“Dok bene ibikwanyo dwolo nyok romo, ki moo yibe, ki dwolo ma oumo jam iye, ki okene ma i kom cwiny, ki olaŋ aryo kacel ki dwolo ma tye i komgi, ki em tun lacuc, (pien obedo nyok romo me keto dano i dog tic),
ki mugati acel ki capat acel ma girubo iye moo, ki capat marep acel ma i aduku me mugati ma tobi pe iye ma tye i nyim Rwot;
ci ibiketogi ducu i dye ciŋ Aron ki i dye ciŋ awo bene bene, wek gikwatgi me bedo gityer akwata i nyim Rwot.
Ka dok ikwany woko ki i ciŋgi, iwaŋgi woko i wi keno tyer me ameda i kom gitum awaŋa, obed gin ma ŋwece kur ma yomo cwiny Rwot; en aye gityer ma giwaŋo ki mac bot Rwot.
“Dok ibikwanyo gok nyok romo me keto Aron i dog ticce, ci ikwat me bedo gityer me akwata i nyim Rwot; en aye bibedo waŋ wat ma tuŋ boti.
Dok ibikwero gok me gityer me akwata, ki em me waŋ wat pa ajwagi, ma gikwato, ma gityero nia ki i kom nyok romo me keto dano i dog tic, pien en aye pa Aron ki pa awobene.
Bibedo waŋ wat pa Aron ki pa awobene ma myero jo Icrael gumi botgi dikdik, pien en aye waŋ wat pa ajwagi ma jo Icrael myero gutyer nia ki gitumgi me gityer lakwecwiny, en aye gityergi bot Rwot.
“Boŋŋi aruka pa Aron maleŋ ducu bibedo pa likwaye ma bilube; gibiruko i komgi ka giwirogi ki moo, me ketogi i dog tic.
Latin awobi ma bileyo kakare i t ic me bedo ajwaka birukogi tyeko kwede nino abiro, i kare ma en ci to i kema me rwatte ka tic i kabedo maleŋ.
“Ibitero riŋo nyok romo me ketogi i dog tic, ci itedo i kabedo mo maleŋ;
ci Aron ki awobene gibicamo riŋo nyok romo-nu ki mugati ma tye i aduku, i doggola kema me rwatte.
Gibicamo jami meno ma gitiyo kwede me lakwany bal pi ketogi i dog tic ki kwerogi pi tic maleŋ, ento jo mukene pe gibicamone, pien gin jami maleŋ.
Ka riŋo mo me ketogi i dog tic, nyo mugati mo, odoŋ nio odiko, ci ibiwaŋo mudoŋ-ŋi awaŋa ki mac; pe dok gibicamo, pien leŋ.
“Ibitimo i kom Aron ki awobene kameno, kit macalo aciki kwede ducu; ibitiyo tic me ketogi i dog ticgi pi nino abiro;
dok ibityero twon acel pi gitum me bal nino ducu me lakwany bal. Dok ibitumo gitum me bal pi keno tyer, ka itimo gin lakwany bal ki i kome, dok ibiwire ki moo pi kwerone.
Ibitimo gin lakwany bal ki i kom keno tyer, ibikwere pi nino abiro, miyo keno tyer doko maleŋ maka to; gin ducu ma bigudo ke no tyer bidoko maleŋ.
“Magi aye gin ma ibityero i wi keno tyer: nyogi romi aryo ma ditogi romo mwaka acel acel en aye ibityerogi nino ducu.
Ibityero nyok romo acel odiko ki nyok romo acel ibityero otyeno.

Kacel ki romo mukwoŋo-ni ibityero moko kwon mapwotte ma romo agwata acel ma girubo ki moo nyig jeituni ma giodo aoda ma romo cupa aryo ki nucu, ki vino ma romo cupa aryo ki nucu, me bedo gityer amata.
Nyok romo mukene ibityero otyeno, kacel ki gityer me moko kwon ki gityer amatane, macalo me odiko, pi bedo gin ma ŋwece kur ma yomo cwiny, gityer ma giwaŋo ki mac bot Rwot.
Bibedo gitum awaŋa me nino ducu ma wubityero wa i kare pa likwayowu ducu, i doggola kema me rwatte i nyim Rwot, ka ma abirwatte iye kwedwu, pi lok kwedwu kunnu.
Abirwatte ki jo Icrael kunnu, ci deyona bilonyogi gibedo maleŋ;
abikwero kema me rwatte ki keno tyer; ka dok abikwero Aron ki awobene pi t icgi bota me bedo ajwagi.
Dok abibedo i kin jo Icrael, abibedo Lubaŋagi.
Gin giŋeyo ni an a Rwot Lubaŋagi, ma yam akwanyogi woko ki i lobo Ejipt wek abed i kingi; an a Rwot Lubaŋagi.
“Ibitiyo keno tyer me waŋo odok eceta; ibitiyo ki bao yat lalwii.
Borre obed futi acel ki nucu, ki lacce bene futi acel ki nucu; borre ki Lacce bibedo marom, Borre tuŋ malo obed futi adek; ten keno aŋwen ducu bene gubed ma gukubbe kacel kwede.
Ibimwono kome woko ki jabu ma giliyo maber, wiye ki bute ducu, ki ten keno aŋwen ducu; dok ibilulo doge ducu, irumo woko ki jabu.
Ibitimo agit me jabu aryo pire; ibiketo agit ki piny i te doge ma ilulo-ni, kun agit acel acel okemme ki wadi tun cel, ci ibirwako iye tal me tiŋone.
Ibitiyo tal ki bao yat lalwii, ibimwono komgi woko ki jabu.
Ibiketo keno tyer man i nyim boŋo kicika ma umo canduk lok me caden, i nyim kom me kica ma i wi canduk lok me caden, ka ma abirwatte iye kwedi.
Ci Aron biwaŋo iye odok eceta ma ŋwece kur. Nino ducu ka en yubo mac laput odiko, ci biwaŋone;
dok ka Aron keto mac laput malo otyeno, ci biwaŋone, Kit meno gibiwaŋo odok eceta nino ducu i nyim Rwot, wa i kare pa likwayowu ducu.
Pe wubityero iye odok eceta mo ata, kadi gitum awaŋa, kadi gityer me moko kwon; dok pe wuony iye gityer amata.

Aron myero otim gin lakwany bal i kom ten keno aŋwen ducu ma i kome i mwaka acel kicel; en bitimo gin lakwany bal ki i kome ki remo me gitum me bal me lakwany bal i mwaka acel kicel wa i kare pa likwayowu ducu: en aye gin maleŋ makato bot Rwot.” Lim me lakwany bal
Rwot owaco bot Moses ni
“Ka icako kwaŋo wei jo Icrael, ci ŋat acel acel bimiyo gin lakok kwone kene bot Rwot ka ikwanogi, wek two gemo pe opot i komgi ka ikwanogi.
Dano acel acel ka ikwano welle bimiyo gin man: nucu cekel me kabedo maleŋ (cekel acel rom ki gerapyeraryo); nucu cekel meno bibedo gityer bot Rwot.
Dano ducu ki acel acel ma doŋ gikwano welle, cakke i kom jo ma ditogi romo mwaka pyeraryo ki makato, bimiyo gityer bot Rwot.
Lalonyo pe bimiyo madwoŋ, dok lacan bene pe bimiyo matidi ma pe rom ki nucu cekel, i kare me miyo gityer bot Rwot me lakwany bal ki i komwu.
Ibigamo lim me lakwany bal ki bot jo Icrael, i biketo pi tic me kema me rwatte, wek obed me po pi jo Icrael i nyim Rwot pi kwanyo bal ki i komwu.”
Rwot owaco bot Moses ni
“Dok ibitiyo otako mola, ki tedi tere bene me mola, obed me lwok. Ibicibo cuŋ i kin kema me rwatte ki keno tyer; ka doŋ ibionyo iye pii;
en aye ka ma Aron ki awo bene gibilwoko iye ciŋgi ki tyengi.
I kare ma gicito i kema me rwatte, nyo ka gicito cok ki keno tyer ka tic iye, me waŋo gityer ma giwaŋo ki mac bot Rwot, koŋ gibilwokke ki pii, wek pe guto.
Gibilwoko ciŋgi ki tyengi wek pe guto; bibedo cik botgi matwal, bote ki bot likwaye, wa i kare pa likwayogi ducu.” Moo wir
Dok Rwot omedde owaco bot Moses ni,
“Kwany aŋwece mabecone makato: murra maliyo ma romo cekel miya abic, cinamon ma ŋwece mit ma romo cekel miya aryo ki pyerabic, ma en aye nucune, lum ma ŋwece kur ma roma miya aryo ki pyerabic,
kaciya cinamon miya abic, ma gipimo ki cekel me kabedo maleŋ, ki moo jeituni ma romo cupa apar.
Man aye ibitimo ki moo maleŋ me wir ma girubo i kit macalo larub moo ma ŋwe kur rubo kwede; bibedo moo wir maleŋ.
Ibiwiro ki kema me rwatte ki canduk lok me caden,
ki meja ki jami ticce ducu, ki okar-mac tara ki jami ticce ducu, ki keno me odok eceta,
ki keno tyer me gitum awaŋa ki jami ticce ducu, ki otako lwok ki tedi tere.
Ibikwerogi wek gubed jami maleŋ makato; gin ducu ma bigudo komgi bidoko maleŋ.
Dok ibiwiro Aron ki awobene, me kwerogi wek guti bota tic me ajwagi.
Dok ibiwaco ki jo Icrael ni, ‘Man aye bibedo moona maleŋ me wir, wa i kare pa likwayowu ducu.
Pe gibionyo i kom dano mo ata, pe wubitiyo mukene ma girubo macalo en; en moo maleŋ, bibedo maleŋ botwu bene.
Dok ŋat ma birubo macalo meno, nyo ŋat ma biwiro i kom dano mo ata, waŋe birwenyo woko ki i kin lutugi.’ ” Odok eceta
Rwot owaco bot Moses ni, “Kwany aŋwece makur, citakte ki onika ki galbanu, aŋwece makur, ki odok luban ma giliyo maber, (pekgi ducu obed marom)
ci itim ki odok eceta maleŋ ma, giliyo maber, ma girubo i kit macalo larub gin ma ŋwe kur rubo kwede, ci ipwor iye kado.
Mukene ibiluro iŋido matitino twatwal, ci iket mogo i nyim canduk lok me caden ma i kema me rwatte ka ma abirwatte iye kwedi; bibedo botwu gin maleŋ makato.
Pe wubitimo piwu kenwu odok eceta ma irubo macalo meno; bibedo gin maleŋ bot Rwot ki tuŋ botwu.
Ŋat ma birubo gin me aŋweya macalo meno, waŋe birwenyo woko ki i kin lutugi.”
Rwot owaco bot Moses ni,
“Nen, atyeko lwoŋo nyiŋ Bejalel wod pa Uri, ma wod pa Kur, ma i kaka pa Juda.
Doŋ atyeko poŋo en ki Cwiny pa Lubaŋa, ki kwiri me tic, ki niaŋ matut, ki ŋec, ki kit tic ducu me diro,
pi roto cal manyen me tic diro mapatpat, me tic ki jabu, ki ryal, ki mola,
ki pi ŋolo litino kidi me wel me amwona i kom jabu, ki pi payo bao, ki pi tiyo kit tic ducu me diro.
Dok nen, atyeko keto Okoliab bene kacel ki en, ma wod pa Akicamak, ma i kaka pa Dan; dok atyeko miyo kwiri me tic bot jo ducu makwiri, wek guti gin ducu ma aciko boti-ni:
kema me rwatte, ki canduk lok me caden, ki kom me kica ma i wiye, ki jami ma i kema ducu,
meja ki jami ticce, okar-mac me jabu ma giliyo maber ki jami ticce ducu, keno tyer me odok eceta,
keno tyer me gitum awaŋa ki jami ticce ducu, otako lwok ki tedi tere,
boŋŋi aruka ma gitiyo mabeco, boŋŋi aruka maleŋ pa ajwaka Aron, ki boŋŋi aruka pa awobene pi ticgi me bedo ajwagi,
moo wir ki odok eceta ma ŋwece kur pi kabedo maleŋ. Gibitiyo kit macalo doŋ aciki kwede ducu.” Cabit aye lanyut
Rwot owaco bot Moses ni,
“Wac bot jo Icrael ni, ‘Wubigwoko cabitta, pien en aye lanyut ma tye i kin an ki wun wa i kare pa likwayowu ducu, wek wuŋe ni an a Rwot, ma alonyowu wubedo maleŋ.
Wugwok cabit, pien nino-nu leŋ botwu; ka ŋatti mo opyedde i kome, myero gineke woko. Ka ŋat ma otiyo iye tic mo, dano meno waŋe birwenyo woko ki i kin lutugi.
Wubitiyo tic nino abicel, ento nino me abiro en aye cabit me yweyo mot, nino maleŋ bot Rwot; ŋat ma otiyo tic mo i cabit gibineko woko.
Pi meno myero jo Icrael gugwok cabit wa i kare pa likwayogi ducu, macalo gicikke ma bedo matwal.
En aye lanyut matwal i kin an ki jo Icrael, ni, Rwot yam otiyo polo ki lobo nino abicel, oywe mot i nino me abiro, oomo iye kero kome.’ ”
Ka Lubaŋa doŋ otyeko lok ki Moses i wi got Cinai, ci omiye kidi ma apada aryo me lok me caden, kidi ma apada aryo ma Lubaŋa ocoyo ki ciŋe.

Ka lwak guneno ni Moses doŋ ori, pe dwogo piny ki i wi got, ci gucokke gugurre kengi bot Aron, kun giwacce ni, “A malo, itim ki wan lubaŋa, ma gibitelo wiwa; pien Moses man, ma en aye dano ma yam okwanyowa woko ki i lobo Ejipt, pe doŋ waŋeyo gin mutimme i kome.”
Ci Aron owaco botgi ni, “Wukwany agit me jabu ma gitye i it monwu ki awobewu ki anyirawu, wukelgi bota.”
Kit meno lwak ducu gukwanyo agit me jabu ki i itgi woko, gukelo bot Aron.
En ogamo jabu ki i ciŋgi, ci oteto ki nyol me liŋo kome, ci otimo cal wod twon ma giliyo aliya, ci guwaco ni, “Man aye lubaŋawu, wun jo Icrael, ma yam okwanyowu woko ki i lobo Ejipt!”
Ka Aron oneno kit man, ci ocako caŋo keno tyer i nyime; ka ocako tucone ka maleŋ kun waco ni, “Diki bibedo kwero nino madit bot Rwot.”
Ci gua malo odiko con, gutyero gitum awaŋa mapol, ka gukelo tyergi me lakwecwiny; ci lwak gubedo piny gucamo ka gumato, ci gua malo ka tuko.
Rwot owaco bot Moses ni, “Lor piny; pien joni ma yam ikwanyogi ki i lobo Ejipt guballe woko.

Guweko kit ma yam acikogi kwede woko oyotoyot, gutimo pigi kengi cal wod twon ma giliyo aliya, gucako worone ki miye gitum, dok giwacci, ‘Man aye lubaŋawu, wun jo Icrael, ma yam okwanyowu woko ki i lobo Ejipt!’”
Ci Rwot owaco bot Moses ni, “Atyeko neno jo man, ci nen, gin jo ma ŋutgi tek:
mumiyo kombeddi doŋ iweka gira, wek akemo omaka matek i komgi, arid wigi woko; ento in abimiyi idoko rok madit.”
Ento Moses obako doge bot Rwot Lubaŋane kun waco ni, “Ai Rwot, piŋo akemo omaki matek i kom lwakki, ma yam in ikwanyogi woko ki i lobo Ejipt ki tek madwoŋ ki badi matek.
Piŋo iweko jo Ejipt giwacci, ‘Oterogi marac akaka me tyekogi i kin godi kuca, ki pi rido wigi woko ki i wi lobo.’ Lok akemoni mager-ri woko, dok iŋut i kom gin marac ma imito timo i kom lwakki.

Po i kom Abraim, Icaka ki Icrael luticci, ma yam in kikomi aye, ikwonne ki nyiŋi kekeni botgi. Yam iwaco botgi ni, ‘Abimiyo wunya mapol macalo lakalatwe me polo; ki lobo man ducu, ma yam aciko pire, abimiyo bot likwayowu, ma gibileyone ma twal.’ “
Ci Rwot oŋut i kom gin marac ma yam en otamo ni ebitimo i kom lwakke.
Moses olokke, olor piny ki i wi got kun tye ki kidi ma apada aryo me lok me caden i ciŋe; kidi magi gicoyo tuŋ igi ki ŋegi bene, gicoyo tuŋ cel ki tuŋ ŋegi ducu.
Kidi meno ma apada Lubaŋa aye otiyo, ki coc bene Lubaŋa aye ocoyo, ma gigoro i kom kidi meno ma apada.
Ka Yocwa owinyo dwan lwak ma giwo, ci owaco bot Moses ni, “Woo me lweny tye i gony.”
Ento Moses ogamo ni, “Meno pe woo me loyo lweny, dok pe koko pa jo ma giloyogi, ento an awinyo dwan me wer aye.”
Ka en obino cok ki gony, ma oneno twon ki myel, ci akemo omako Moses matek; obolo kidi aryo ma apada ma tye i ciŋe-ni piny, otyerogi woko i te got.
Ci okwanyo cal wod twon ma gitimo-ni owaŋo woko i mac, orego woko mayom, oonyo i pii, omiyo jo Icrael gumato.
Moses openyo Aron ni, “Lwak man gutimi niŋniŋ, mumiyo ikelo bal madit i komgi-ni?”
Aron ogamo ni, “Pe iwek akemo omaki matek, laditta; in iŋeyo ni lwak man cwinygi okemo gin marac.
Pien gin guwacca ni, ‘Tim ki waŋ lubaŋa, ma gibitelo wiwa; pien Moses man, ma en aye dano ma yam okwanyowa woko ki i lobo Ejipt, pe doŋ waŋeyo gin mutimme i kome.’
Ci awaco botgi ni, ‘Dano acel acel ma tye ki jabu ogony woko’; ci gimiya, aonyo i mac, ci cal wod twon man oa ki iye.”
Ka Moses oneno ni lwak wigi oteŋ woko, (pien Aron aye omiyo wigi oteŋ, kun oweko lewic omakogi i kin lukworgi),
ci Moses ocuŋ i doggaŋ me gony, owaco ni, “Aŋa ma tye tuŋ bot Rwot? Obin bota.” Ci awobe pa Levi ducu gucokke kacel bote.

Ci owaco botgi ni, “Rwot Lubaŋa pa jo Icrael owaco kuman ni ‘Dano acel acel oket pala lucwanne i lak ŋete, wek ocit kwede i dye gony kun wirre kwede dok i doggaŋ tuŋ cel ki tuŋ cel, orum iye, kun ŋat man neko ominne, ŋat man neko latugi, ki ŋat man neko lawote.’ ”
Awobe pa Levi gutiyo kit macalo Moses ocikogi; ci gineko lwak dano i nino meno ma guromo co alip adek.
Moses owaco ni, “Tin wun wukette kenwu i dog tic pa Rwot, kun ŋat acel acel omiyo wode ki ominne me bedo gityer, wek omiwu gum tin.”
Orwone Moses owaco bot lwak ni, “Wun wutimo bal madit; kombeddi abicito malo bot Rwot, gwok nyo abikwanyo bal woko ki i komwu.”
Kit meno Moses odok bot Rwot, owaco ni, “Maa do, lwak man gutimo bal, madit; gutimo lubaŋa me jabu pigi kengi.
Ento koni, ka ibitimogi kica i kom balgi, ci timgi; nyo ka pe, ci alegi ni, ijwa nyiŋa woko ki i bukki ma icoyo.”
Ento Rwot owaco ki Moses ni, “Ŋat ma obalo i nyima en aye abijwayo nyiŋe woko ki i bukka.
Ento doŋ icit kombeddi, icitel wi lwak, itergi i kabedo ma yam alokki pire-ni; nen, lamalaikana bitelo nyimi. Ento i kare ma abilimogi, an aye abiketo can i komgi pi bal man.”
Ci Rwot ocwalo gemo opoto i kom lwak, pien gutimo cal wod twon ma Aron otiyo.

Rwot owaco bot Moses ni, “Wua woko ki kany, in ki lwak ducu ma yam ikwanyogi woko ki i lobo Ejipt, pi terogi i lobo ma yam akwoŋo pire bot Abraim, Icaka, ki Yakobo, kun acikogi ni, abimiyo bot likwayogi.
Dok abicwalo lamalaika i nyimgi, ci abiryemo jo Kanaan woko, ki jo Amor, jo Kit, jo Periji, jo Kiv ki jo Jebuc.
Cit malo i lobo ma mol cak ki moo kic; ento an pe abicito kwedwu kunnu, wek pe arid wiwu woko iyo, pien wun jo ma ŋutwu tek.”
Ka lwak giwinyo lok man marac-ci, ci gukumo; pe tye dano mo ma orukke me deyo.

Pien onoŋo Rwot owaco bot Moses ni, “Wac bot jo Icrael ni, ‘Wun wu jo ma ŋutwu tek; kono ka acito kwedwu kunnu pi kare manok mo, kono arido wiwu woko cut. Kombeddi doŋ wuluny ruk me deyowu woko ki i komwu, wek aŋe gin ma abitimo i komwu.’ “
Mumiyo jo Icrael gulunyo ruk me deyogi woko, nia ki i te got Koreb ki cito kwede anyim.
I kare meno Moses obedo ka tero kema, ci guro woko i ne gony, ka mabor ki gony; ci olwoŋo ni, kema me rwatte. Ci ŋat ma yenyo Rwot cito woko i kema me rwatte, ma tye woko i ŋe gony.
I kare ducu ma Moses kato cito woko i kema me rwatte, lwak ducu gia malo, kun ŋat acel acel cuŋ i nyim dog kemane, ka neno kor Moses nio ka odonyo wa i kema.
Ka Moses odonyo i kema, ci wir me pol dwogo piny cuŋ i doggola kema me rwatte, ci Rwot loko ki Moses.
Ka lwak dano ducu guneno wir me pol ma ocuŋ i dog kema, ci dano ducu gia malo, giworo Lubaŋa, kun ŋat acel acel tye i dog kemane.
Kit meno Rwot yam loko ki Moses waŋ ki waŋ, macalo dano loko ki lareme, Ka Moses odok i gony, Yocwa wod pa Nun, latin awobi ma lakony en, yam doŋ i kema.
Moses owaco bot Rwot ni, “Nen, in onoŋo iwacca ni, ‘Kwany jo man woko;’ ento pe imiya aŋeyo ŋat ma ibicwalo acito kwede. Ento iwacci, ‘Aŋeyo in ki nyiŋi, ki in bene iyomo cwinya.’
Koni doŋ alegi, ka onoŋo ayomo cwinyi, nyutta kiti, wek aŋeyi, anoŋ gum ki boti. Dok itam bene ni, rok man gin aye lwakki.”
Ci Rwot ogamo ni, “An kikoma abiwot kwedi, abimiyi iywe mot.”
Dok owacce ni, “Ka in kikomi pe ibicito kweda, ci pe ikwanywa woko ki kany.
Pien biŋene niŋniŋ ni anoŋo gum ki boti, an kacel ki lwakki? Pe pi in ma iwoto kwedwa-ni mumiyo wanen pat? An, kacel ki lwakki, wapat ki jo mukene ducu ma gitye i wi lobo.”
Rwot owaco bot Moses ni, “Abitiyo gin man ma iwaco-ni kikome; pien iyomo cwinya, dok aŋeyo in ki nyiŋi.”
Moses ogamo ni, “Alegi inyutta deyoni.”
Rwot ogamo ni, “Abimiyo berra ducu kato ki i nyimi, ka dok abituco nyina ni, ‘A Rwot’; abinyuto berra bot ŋat ma abinyuto berra bote, dok abitimo kica bot ŋat ma abitimo kica bote.”
Rwot dok owaco ni, “Ento pe ibineno waŋa; pien dano pe neno waŋa ci bedo kwo.”
Ci Rwot owacci, “Nen, kabedo mo tye ka ŋeta ka ma ibicuŋ iye i kom got.
Ka deyona bikato ki kenyo, ci abiketi i kin got ma obar, ci abiumi woko ki ciŋa nio ka akato otum;
ka doŋ abikwanyo ciŋa woko, ci ibineno ŋeya; ento waŋa pe ibinenone.”
Rwot owaco bot Moses ni, “Tyeŋ kidi ma apada aryo macalo mukwoŋo ca, ci abicoyo i komgi lok ma nene acoyo i kom kidi mukwoŋo-ni, ma yam ityero wokoni.
Bed ma iyubbe odiko, ci ibin malo odiko i wi got Cinai, icuŋ i nyima i wi got.
Pe ŋatti mo bibino kwedi malo, pe ŋatti mo onen i wi got ducu; romi ki dyaŋi pe gucam nyim got.”
Ci Moses otyeŋo kidi aryo ma apada macalo mukwoŋo ca; ci oa malo odiko con, oito i wi got Cinai, kit macalo Rwot ocike, otero kidi ma apada ma omako i ciŋe.
Ci Rwot olor piny i pol, ocuŋ kacel kwede kunnu, ci otuco nyiŋe.
Rwot okato ki i nyime kun tucce ni, “Rwot, Rwot, Lubaŋa ma lakica dok maro dano, kiniga pe make oyot, marre ma pe lokke dwoŋ, en lagen mada.

En gwoko mar ma pe lokke pi jo alip ki alip, kun weko rocgi, ki tim aranyigi ki balgi. En pe kwanyo kop i kom lubalo, ento keto can i kom likwayogi ki i kom likwayo pa likwayogi nio i yalwak me adek ki me aŋwen.”
Moses orune oyot, okulo wiye piny i ŋom, oworo Lubaŋa.
Owaco ni. “Koni doŋ ka ayomo cwinyi, ai Rwot, alegi in Rwot iwot kwedwa, kadi bed waŋ jo ma ŋutwa tek; itimwa kica pi rocwa ki balwa, imiwa wabed lwakki.”

Rwot dok owaco ni, “Nen aketo gicikke. Abitiyo gin me aura mapol i nyim lwakki ducu, ma yam peya otine i lobo ducu nyo i rok mo; ci jo ducu ma wubedo i kingi gibineno tic pa Rwot; abitiyo kwedwu gin ma kelo atiba i kom dano.
“Gwok lok ma aciki iye tin. Nen, abiryemo jo Amor woko ki i nyimi, ki jo Kanaan, jo Kit, jo Periji, jo Kiv ki jo Jebuc.
Gwokke pe iket gicikke mo ki jo ma bedo i lobo-nu, wek pe odok owic i kinwu.
Ento wumuk keno jogigi woko, wuret wir jogigi piny, wutoŋ yadi ma gipito ka ma giworo iye jok ma dako ma gilwoŋo Acera.
Pe myero wuwor lubaŋa mukene, pien Rwot, ma nyiŋe Lanyeko, en Lubaŋa ma lanyeko.
Gwok iket gicikke mo ki jo ma bedo i lobo-nu: pien ka giworo lubaŋagi ki tim kwele kwele, nyo gityero gitum bot lubaŋagi, ce ŋatti mo olwoŋi, miyo ibicamo gin ma en otumo.
Dok ka inyomo anyiragi ki awobeni, ce anyiragi gitimo abor pi woro lubaŋagi, ci miyo awobeni bene giworo lubaŋagi ki tim kwele kwele.
“Pe iti cal lubaŋa mo me nyonyo aliya piri keni.
“Ibikwero nino madito me Mugati ma Tobi Pe Iye, Ibicamo mugati ma tobi pe iye pi nino abiro macalo yam acikowu, i kare ma giciko, i dwe me Abib; pien yam ia woko ki i lobo Ejipt i dwe me Abib.
“Litino kayo ducu mega, litino twonini, litino kayo me dyaŋi ki me romi.
Latin kayo pa kana ibikoko ki latin nyok romo, nyo ka pe ikoko, ci itur ŋute woko. Litino kayo ducu ma gin litino awobeni ibikokogi. Dano mo pe obin i nyima ki ciŋe noŋo.
“Ibitic nino abicel, ento i nino me abiro ibiywe iye; wa i kare me pur ki i kare me kac bene ibiywe.
Ibibedo ki nino madit me kwero agikki cabit abiro, en aye wi mwaka me kayo naŋo mukwoŋo cek; ki nino madito me nyonone i dero i tum mwaka.
Joni ma co ducu gibibino i nyim Rwot Lubaŋa, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, tyen adek i mwaka acel.
Pien abiryemo lurok woko ki i nyimi, abimiyo waŋ loboni bedo malac; ŋatti mo bene pe bibedo ki miti i kom loboni i kare ma ibiwot ka nen i nyim Rwot Lubaŋawu tyen adek i mwaka acel acel.
“Pe ityer remo me gitumma kacel ki tobi; pe giwek gitum me nino madit me Kato (Paska) obed nio wa odiko.
“Cam mukwoŋo cek i potoni me wi mwaka myero ikel i ot pa Rwot Lubaŋani. “Pe ited riŋo latin dyel ki cak pa minne.”
Rwot owaco bot Moses ni, “Co lok magi; pien doŋ acikke kwedwu, in ki jo Icrael, ki gicikke ma lubo lok magi ducu.”
En obedo kunnu kacel ki Rwot nino pyeraŋwen, dyeceŋ ki dyewor, kun pe camo dok pe mato pii bene. Ci ocoyo lok me gicikke i kom kidi ma apada, gin aye cik apar-ri.

Ka lacen Moses olor piny ki i wi got Cinai, ma omako kidi ma apada aryo me lok me caden i ciŋe. I kare ma en lor piny ki wi got, onoŋo Moses pe ŋeyo ni tur nyime tye ka ryeny, pien onoŋo obedo ka lok ki Lubaŋa.
Ka Aron ki jo Icrael ducu guneno Moses, ci nen, tur nyime obedo ka ryeny; ci gulworo cito bote cok.
Ento Moses olwoŋogi; ci Aron ki lutel wi lwak ducu gucako dok bote, Moses oloko kwedgi.
Ka lacen jo Icrael ducu gucito bote cok, ocako miyogi cik ducu ma Rwot otitte i wi got Cinai.
Ka doŋ Moses otyeko lok kwedgi, ci umo tur nyime ki boŋo;
ento i kare ducu ma Moses cito i nyim Rwot ka lok kwede, kwanyo boŋo woko ki i tur nyime, nio wa ka dwogone; ka okatti woko ci tito ki jo Icrael lok ma gicike kwede.
Ka jo Icrael gineno tur nyim Moses, gineno ni del tur nyim Moses ryeny; ci Moses dok umo tur nyime woko ki boŋo, nio ka dok cito ka lok kwede.
Moses ocoko lwak jo Icrael ducu, owaco botgi ni, “Man aye gin ma Rwot ociko ni wutim.
Wuti tic nino abicel, ento i nino me abirone wubed ki cabit maleŋ me yweyo mot bot Rwot; ŋat ma otiyo iye tic mo gibineke woko.
Pe wubimoko mac i pacowu ducu i nino me cabit.”
Dok Moses owaco bot lwak jo Icrael ducu ni, “Man aye gin ma Rwot ociko ni,
wujog gityer pa Rwot ki i kinwu; ŋat ma cwinye aye opwoyo wek en okel gityer bot Rwot: jabu, ryal ki mola;
uci ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre; yer dyegi,
laa nyogi romi ma ginyoŋo, laa dyegi; bao yat okuto lalwii;
moo me mac, aŋwece me yubo moo wir ki pi odok eceta ma ŋwece kur;
litino kidi onik ki litino kidi me wel me amwona i kom jabu pi epod ki pi kicaa kor.
“Dok jo ducu ma i kinwu makwiri i tic gubin guti jami ducu ma Rwot ociko pigi: guti kema,
kemane ki laum wiye, golle ki gutine, riine, wirre ki tedi tere;
canduk me cik ki talle, kom me kica ki boŋo kicika me laumme;
meja ki talle ki jami ticce ducu, ki mugati me aketa i nyim Lubaŋa;
okar-mac ki jami ticce ki laputte, ki moo me macce;
keno tyer me odok eceta ki talle, ki moo wir, ki odok eceta ma ŋwece kur, ki boŋo cuka laum doggola, me doggola me kema;
keno tyer me gitum awaŋa, kacel ki keikeine me mola, ki talle ki jami ticce ducu, ki otako lwok ki tedi tere;
boŋo cuka me aŋaba ma larum dyekal, ki wirre ki tedi tere, ki boŋo cuka laum doggaŋ me dyekal;
teke me terro kema ki teke me dyekal ki tol lacikgi;
boŋŋi aruka ma gitiyogi mabeco me tic kwedgi i kabedo maleŋ, ki boŋŋi aruka maleŋ pi ajwaka Aron, ki boŋŋi aruka pa awobene pi tic megi me bedo ajwagi.” Dano gukelo gityer
Ci lwak jo Icrael ducu gua woko ki i nyim Moses.
Ka gucako dwogo, kun ŋat acel acel oyubbe ki gin ma cwinye olyetto pire, ki ŋat acel acel ma iye pwoyo, okelo gityer bot Rwot me timo ki kema me rwatte, ki pi ticce ducu, ki pi boŋŋi aruka maleŋ.
Ci gubino, co wa ki mon; jo ducu ma cwinygi aye opwoyo gukelo jarara, ki agit me it, ki agit ciŋ, ki mola ŋut ciŋ, ki kit jabu ducu, kun dano acel acel emo gityer me jabu bot Rwot.
Dano ducu ma tye ki uci ma bulu, nyo ma lamar lamar, nyo makwar, nyo boŋo camanini maberre, nyo yer dyegi, nyo laa nyogi romi ma ginyoŋo, nyo laa dyegi, ducu gukelogi.
Dano acel acel ma romo kela gityer me ryal, nyo mola, gukelo me gityer bot Rwot; ki dano ducu ma tye ki bao yat okuto lalwii ma romo kit tic ducu gukelo bene.
Ki mon ducu makwiri i tic gubedo ka wiyo uci ki ciŋgi, gucako kela uci ma guwiyo ma bulu, ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre.
Ci mon ducu ma cwinygi olyetto pi kwiri me tic guwiyo yer dyegi.
Ki lutel wic bene gukelo litino kidi onik, ki litino kidi me wei me amwona i kom jabu, pi epod ki pi kicaa kor,
ki aŋwece, ki moo me mac ki pi moo wir, ki pi odok eceta ma ŋwece kur.
Jo Icrael ma co ki ma mon ducu ma yam cwinygi opwoyo pi kelo gin mo pi tic ma onoŋo Rwot ociko Moses ni oti, gukelo gityer ma igi opwoyo bot Rwot.
Ci Moses owaco bot jo Icrael ni, “Nen, Rwot otyeko lwoŋo nyiŋ Bejalel wod pa Uri, ma wod pa Kur, ma i kaka pa Juda;
dok otyeko poŋo en ki Cwiny pa Lubaŋa, ki kwiri me tic, ki niaŋ matut, ki ŋec, ki k it tic ducu me diro,
pi roto cal manyen me tic diro mapatpat, me tic ki jabu, ki ryal ki mola,
ki pi ŋolo litino kidi me wel me amwona i kom jabu, ki pi payo bao, pi tiyo kit tic ducu me diro.
Dok omiye cwiny me pwony, en kacel ki Okoliab wod pa Akicamak, ma i kaka pa Dan.

En otyeko poŋogi ki kwiri me tiyo kwa tic ducu me diro, ki me roto cal tic manyen me tic diro, ki me dero boŋo ki uci ma bulu, ki ma lamar lamar, ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre, ki me cweyo boŋo, ki me tiyo kwa t ic ducu, ki me roto cal manyen me tic diro mapatpat.

“Bejalel ki Okoliab ki jo ducu ma kwiri i tic, ma Rwot oketo kwiri me tic i igi, ki niaŋ matut, me ŋeyo ki me tiyo tic ducu me tic i kabedo maleŋ, gibitiyo kun gilubo kit ducu ma yam Rwot ociko.” Dano gutyero mot madwoŋ
Moses olwoŋo Bejalel ki Okoliab ki jo ducu ma kwiri i tic, ma Rwot onoŋo oketo kwiri me tic i igi, dano ducu ma cwinygi olyetto pi bino ka tic;
ci gugamo ki bot Moses mot ducu ma jo Icrael gutyero pi tic i kom kabedo maleŋ, Pud onoŋo gimedde ameda ki kelo gityer ma igi opwoyo odiko odiko.
Pien lukwiri tic ducu ma gitiyo kwa tic mo ma i kom kabedo maleŋ gubino, kun ŋat acel acel oa ki i dog tic ma en tiyo,
ci guwaco bot Moses ni, “Dano doŋ gukelo madwoŋ mukato ma yam mitte pi tic ma Rwot ocikowa ni wati.”
Kit meno omiyo Moses ocwalo cik, lokke gitito oromo i gony ducu ni, “Pe dok laco mo kadi dako mo otim gin mo me gityer pi kabedo maleŋ.” Ci gijuko dano pe dok gukelo;
pien jami ma gukelo onoŋo doŋ oromo tiyo tic ducu, ki makato bene.

Jo ducu ma kwiri i tic ma yam gitye i kin lutic gutiyo kema ki boŋo cuka apar, ma gitiyogi ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre, ki uci ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar, kun gicweyo iye cal lukerubi ma gitiyogi ki diro.
Bor boŋo cuka acel acel onoŋo oromo yadi apar wiye aŋwen, ki lacce romo yadi aryo; boŋo cuka ducu gubedo marom.
Oribo boŋo cuka abic kacel, ki abic mu kene bene oribo kacel kit meno.
Ci okwoyo waŋ jarara ma bulu i dog boŋo cuka me dul mukwoŋo mugikoni, ka dok okwoyo waŋ jarara i dog boŋo cuka me dul me aryone mugiko-ni, ma rom ki wadi.
Okwoyo waŋ jarara pyerabic i dog boŋo cuka acel, ki waŋ jarara pyerabic i dog boŋo cuka me aryone, kun waŋ jarara kemo wadi.
Dok otiyo jarara gol me jabu pyerabic, ci oribo dog boŋo cuka ki jarara gol-li; ci kema obedo mukubbe kacel likiŋ.
Dok otiyo boŋo cuka me yer dyegi bene me laum wi kema; otimo cuka apar wiye acel.
Bor pa cuka acel acel romo yadi apar wiye abic, lac pa cuka acel acel romo yadi aryo; boŋo cuka apar wiye acel-li ducu girom.
Oribo cuka abic kacel pat kengi, ki cuka abicel bene kacel pat kengi.
Okwoyo waŋ jarara pyerabic i dog cuka me dul mukwoŋo mugiko-ni, dok okwoyo jarara pyerabic me dul mukene mugikoni.
Otiyo jarara gol me mola pyerabic me ribo dog kema kacel, wek obed mukubbe kacel likiŋ.
Dok okwoyo laa nyogi romi ma ginyoŋo, ki laa dyegi, me umo wi kema.
Dok otiyo guti me bao yat lalwii, ma ocuŋ atir pi kema.
Bor pa guti obedo futi apar wiye abic, ki lacce futi aryo, i kom guti acel acel.
Guti acel acel obedo ki tyene aryo me kubogi kacel; otiyo guti me kema ducu kit meno.
Otiyo guti me kema kit man: guti pyeraryo i tuŋ acuc.
Ka dok otiyo tedi tere me ryal ma romo pyeraŋwen me kubo iye guti pyeraryonu; tedi tere aryo aryo pi guti acel acel, pi tyene aryo.
Ka dok pi kema tuŋ me aryone, ma tuŋ acam, otiyo guti pyeraryo
ki tedi tere me ryal ma romo pyeraŋwen, tedi tere aryo aryo pi guti acel acel.
Ki pi ne kema, ma tuŋ porocen, en otiyo guti abicel.
Ka dok otiyo guti aryo me twok kema ma i ŋeye.
Gipoko kingi ki tuŋ piny, ento giribo doggi ki tuŋ wigi malo i kom agit mukwoŋo; otiyo aryo ma kit meno pi twoke aryo.
Yam tye guti aboro ki tedi tergi me ryal; tedi tergi obedo apar wiye abicel; i te guti acel acel bedo iye tedi tere aryo.
Otiyo rii me bao yat lalwii abic pi guti me kema tuŋ cel,
ki rii bao abic pi guti me kema tuŋ cel, ki rii bao abic pi guti me kema me ŋeye tuŋ potoceŋ.
Ka dok otiyo rii bao ma i dyere ma oa ki i agikki tuŋ cel nio wa i agikki tuŋ cel ma oŋolo kor guti ari.
Ci omwono kom guti woko ki jabu, ka otiyo agit me jabu me rwako bao iye; ki rii bao bene omwono komgi woko ki jabu.
Ka dok otiyo boŋo kicika me uci ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre; otiyo ma gicweyo iye lukerubi ki tic me diro.
Otiyo pire wir aŋwen me bao yat lalwii, ci omwono komgi woko ki jabu; golgi obedo me jabu, ci oliyo tedi tergi me ryal aŋwen.
Dok onyo boŋo cuka me laum doggola me kema ki uci ma bu lu ki lamar lamar ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre, ma gidero maber.
Dok otiyo wirre abic, ki golgi, Omwono wigi woko, ki otacgi bedo me jabu, ento tedi tergi abic obedo me mola.
Bejalel opayo canduk ki bao yat lalwii; borre obedo futi aŋwen, ki lacce futi aryo, ki borre tuŋ malo futi aryo.
Omwono iye ki ŋeye woko ki jabu ma giliyo maber, ka olulo doge ducu, orumo woko ki jabu.
Ci oliyo agit me jabu aŋwen pi twoke aŋwen ducu, agit aryo pi tuŋ cel ki agit aryo mukene pi tuŋ cel.
Ka dok otiyo tal me yat lalwii, omwono komgi woko ki jabu,
ka orwako tal i agit ma tye i but canduk-ki me tiŋo canduk.
Dok otimo kom me kica ki jabu ma giliyo maber; borre obedo futi aŋwen, ki lacce futi aryo.
Ka otiyo lukerubi aryo me jabu ma otetogi ki nyol. Otiyogi i agikki kom me kica ryoryo ducu,
lakerubi acel i agikki tuŋ cel, ki lakerubi acel i agikkine tun cel; otiyo lukerubi kun gikubbe i kom kom me kica i agikkine aryo ducu.
Lukerubi guyaro bwomgi malo i wiye, guumo wi kom me kica ki bwomgi, kun waŋgi kemme ki wadi; waŋ lukerubi nen ma okemo kom me kica.
En dok otiyo meja ki bao yat lalwii; borre obedo futi adek ki lacce futi acel ki nucu, ki borre tuŋ malo futi aryo.
Omwono kome woko ki jabu ma giliyo maber, ci olulo doge ducu orumo woko ki jabu.
Oketo riine tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi ducu, ma lacce rom ki dye ciŋ, ci olulo doge ducu orumo woko ki jabu.
Oliyo agit aŋwen me jabu pire, ci omwono agit i twoke aŋwen ducu i kom tyene aŋwen.
Agit giketo cok i kom rii, me rwako tal latin meja.
Otiyo tal ki bao yat lalwii me tiŋo meja, omwono komgi woko ki jabu.
Otiyo jami me jabu ma giliyo maber me aketa i wi meja, caanine ki atabone me odok eceta, ki weerre, ki cupane me liyo gityer amata.
En dok otiyo okar-mac ki jabu ma giliyo maber. Tedi okar-mac ki bolle oteto ki nyol; kikopone, en aye wene ki ature ducu, obedo ma gukubbe k acel kwede.

Jaŋe onoŋo tye abicel ma gujany guryeyo gukaco i Jete ryoryo; jaŋ okar-mac adek ma guryeyo i bute tun cel, ki jaŋ okar-mac adek ma guryeyo i bute tuŋ cel, ki jaŋ okar-mac adek ma guryeyo i tuŋ mukene-ni.

I kom jaŋe tuŋ cel obedo iye kikopo adek ma gitimo macalo tur yaa, kun acel acel tye ki wene ki ature, ki i kom jaŋe tuŋ mukene bene obedo iye kikopo adek ma gitimo macalo tur yaa, kun acel acel tye ki wene ki ature; jaŋe abicel ma guryeyo gukaco okar-mac-ci gubedo kit meno.
Ka dok i kom okar-mac kikome-ni onoŋo tye iye kikopo aŋwen ma gitiyo macalo tur yaa, ki wengi ki aturegi,
ki wene ma okubbe i kom okar-mac-ci i te jaŋe abicel ma guryeyo ryoryo i kom okar-mac.
Wengi ki jaŋgi obedo ma gukubbe kacel, kun kome ducu obedo me jabu ma giliyo maber ma giteto ki nyol.
Otiyo mac laputte abiro, ki magacce, ki caanine ki jabu ma giliyo maber.
Oyubo okar-mac ki jami ticce ducu ki jabu ma giliyo maber ma pekke oromo ratili miya acel.

Otiyo keno tyer me waŋo odok eceta ki yat lalwii; borre obedo futi acel ki nucu, ki lacce bene futi acel ki nucu; obedo ma twoke aŋwen ma rom, Borre tuŋ malo oromo futi adek; obedo ki ten keno aŋwen ma gukubbe i kome.
Omwono kome woko ducu ki jabu ma giliyo maber, wiye ki bute ki ten keno ducu; olulo doge ducu orumo woko ki jabu.
Otiyo agit me jabu aryo oketogi i te doge ma gilulo-ni, kun agit acel okemme ki wadi tuŋ cel, me rwako iye tal me tiŋone.
Otiyo tal ki bao yat lalwii, omwono komgi woko ki jabu. Tiyo moo wir ki odok eceta.
Otiyo moo maleŋ me wir bene, ki odok eceta ma ŋwece kur ma giliyo maber, ma girubo kit macalo larub gin ma ŋwe kur timo-ni.
Dok otiyo keno tyer me gitum awaŋa ki bao yat lalwii; borre obedo futi abiro ki nucu, lacce bene futi abiro ki nucu, obedo ki twoke aŋwen ma rom, borre tuŋ malo oromo futi aŋwen ki nucu.
Otimo ten keno aŋwen ducu; ten keno aŋwen ducu gubedo ma gukubbe kacel kwede, dok omwono kome woko ki mola.
Otiyo jami tic me keno tyer ducu, otako, ki akwaya latokke, ki becen, ki lacob riŋo, ki weer Iawau mac; otiyo jami tic meno ducu ki mola.
Dok oyu bo keikei pi keno tyer, me obwo mola ma oketo i te riine, ki i kore.
Oliyo agit aŋwen pi twoke aŋwen me keikei mola, me rwako iye tal me tiŋone.
Otiyo tal ki bao yat lalwii, ci omwono komgi woko ki mola.
Orwako tal odonyo i agit ma tye i but keno tyer-ri me latiŋŋe; otiyo ma iye twolo, ki bao.
En dok otiyo otako mola ki tedi tere bene me mola; otiyo ki madara pa mon ma lutic ma gitiyo i doggola kema me rwatte.
Otimo dyekal me kema; i tuŋ acuc me dyekal giŋabo iye boŋo cuka camanini ma giwiyo maberre ma borre tuŋ cel romo yadi pyerabic.
Wirre onoŋo giromo pyeraryo, ki tedi tergi me mola gubedo pyeraryo, ento gol me wir ki otacgi ducu gubedo me ryal.
Ki tuŋ acam bene borre oromo yadi pyerabic, ki wirre pyeraryo ki tedi tergi pyeraryo me mola; ento gol me wir ki otacgi ducu gubedo me ryal.
Ki bute ma tuŋ potoceŋ bene giŋabo iye boŋo cuka ma borre romo yadi pyeraryo wiye abic; wirre gubedo apar, ki tedi tergi bene apar; gol me wir ki otacgi ducu gubedo me ryal.
Nyime tuŋ wokceŋ onoŋo romo yadi pyeraryo wiye abic.
Boŋo ma giŋabo i ŋet doggola tuŋ cel onoŋo romo yadi abiro ki nucu; wirre gubedo adek, ki tedi tergi adek.
I ŋete tuŋ mukene bene kit meno; i ŋet doggaŋ tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi giŋabo iye boŋo cuka ma romo yadi abiro ki nucu; wir gubedo adek ki tedi tergi adek.
Boŋo cuka ducu ma giŋabo i doggaŋ me dyekal onoŋo gubedo boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre.
Tedi te wir ducu onoŋo gibedo me mola, ento gol me wir ki otacgi gu bedo me ryal; gimwono wigi bene ki ryal, ki wir ducu ma i dyekal giketo iye otac ryal.

Boŋo cuka laum doggaŋ me dyekal gidero kome maber ki uci ma bulu, ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre, kun borre romo yadi apar, ki borre tuŋ malo romo futi abiro ki nucu, ma rom ki boŋo cuka me aŋaba me dyekal.
Wirre gubedo aŋwen, ki tedi tergi aŋwen me mola; golgi gubedo me ryal, ki wigi gumwono woko ki ryal, ki otacgi bene gubedo me ryal.
Teke lagur kema ducu ki teke ma orumo dyekal ducu gubedo me mola. Kwa nyonyo mapatpat ma gitiyo kwede pi kabedo maleŋ
Man aye wel jami ma gitiyo ki kema, en aye kema lok me caden, macalo gikwanogi i kare ma Moses ociko, ma yam obedo pi tic pa jo Levi, kun ladit wi ticgi en aye Itamar wod pa Aron ma ajwaka-ni.
Bejalel wod pa Uri ma wod pa Kur, ma i kaka pa Juda, otiyo jami ducu ma Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Onoŋo tiyo kacel ki Okoliab wod pa Akicamak, ma i kaka pa Dan, dano ma ladiro, ma larot cal tic manyen, ki lader jami ki uci ma bulu, ki lamar lamar, ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre.
Jabu ducu ma gitiyo kwede pi tic i kabedo maleŋ, ki jabu ducu ma oa i gityer, pekke onoŋo romo talanta pyeraryo wiye aboŋwen, ki cekel miya abiro ki pyeradek, kun giporo ki cekel me kabedo maleŋ.
Ki ryal ma oa ki bot lwak ma gikwano onoŋo pekke romo talanta miya acel ki cekel alip acel, ki miya abiro ki pyerabiro wiye abic, kun giporo ki cekel me kabedo maleŋ.

Onoŋo dano acel acel okelo beka acel, (en aye nucu cekel me kabedo maleŋ), pi dano acel acel ma yam gikwano welgi, cakke i kom jo ma ditogi romo mwaka pyeraryo ki dok kwede malo, jo alip miya abicel ki adek, ki miya abic ki pyerabic.

Talanta miya acel me ryal onoŋo obedo me aliya pi tedi te wir me kabedo maleŋ, ki pi tedi te wir me boŋo kicika; tedi tere ma romo miya acel gua ki i kom talanta miya acel, en aye talanta acel pi tedi te wir acel acel.
Ki cekel alip acel ki miya abiro ki pyerabiro wiye abic, otimo ki gol me wir ducu, omwono wigi ducu, dok otiyo ki otacgi.
Mola ma gimiyo onoŋo talanta pyerabiro, ki cekel alip aryo ki miya aŋwen.
Otiyo ki tedi te wir me doggola kema me rwatte, ki ke no tyer me mola, ki keikei me mola, ki jami tic ducu me keno tyer,
ki tedi te wir ma orumo dyekal, ki tedi te wir me doggaŋ me dyekal, ki teke me guro kema, ki teke ma orumo dyekal.
Gikwoyo boŋŋi aruka ma gitiyo mabeco ki uci ma bulu ki lamar lamar, ki makwar pi tic i kabedo maleŋ, gikwoyo boŋŋi maleŋ pi Aron macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Otiyo epod ki jabu ki uci ma bulu ki lamar lamar ki makwar ki camanini ma giwiyo maberre.
Gipado jabu woko marep ki nyol, giliro odoko macalo tol me dero boŋo, kacel ki uci ma bulu, ki ma lamar lamar, ki makwar ki me dero ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre, ki tic me diro.
Gukwoyo gin wi gwok epod, gikubo i doge ryoryo.

Ceme ma i kome ma gicweyo ki diro, me latwene, gikwoyo ki jami lakite acel-lu, ki kit tic acel-lu bene, ki jabu, ki uci ma bulu, ki ma lamar lamar ki makwar ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre: macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Giyubo litino kidi onik, gimwonogi i kom jabu ma giŋweko ki diro, ma doŋ gigoro komgi macalo ladiro goro kom kidi, muporo nyiŋ awobe pa Icrael.
Omwonogi i kom gin wi gwok me epod, wek gubed kidi me po pi awobe pa Icrael, macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Otimo kicaa kor ki tic me diro, macalo tic i kom epod, ki jabu ki uci ma bulu, ki ma lamar lamar, ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre.
Obedo ma twoke aŋwen marom; gibano i kicaa kor aryo; ka doŋ gibano iye aryo, ci borre bedo rom ki lac cin acel, ki lacce bene rom ki lac cin acel.
Gumwono iye litino kidi me wel ma guryeyo i tyeŋ aŋwen. Tyen mukwoŋo obedo cadiuc, topaj ki kabankel:
i tyen me aryone giketo iye emeradi capir ki dayaman;
i tyeŋ me adekke giketo jacint, agat ki ameticito;
ki i tyen me aŋwenne giketo berul, onik ki jacipa; gimwonogi i jabu ma giŋweko ki diro.
Litino kidi gubedo apar wiye aryo, muporo nyiŋ awobe pa Icrael; gubedo macalo kidi ma gigoro me agit, kun kidi acel acel gigoro iye nyiŋ, muporo kaka apar wiye aryo.
Dok gutimo nyor me jabu ma giliyo maber, ma giminogi macalo tol.
Dok gutimo gin lakwak tere aryo me jabu giŋweko ki diro, ki agit me jabu aryo, ci gukwoyo agit aryo-nu i dog kicaa kor aryo bene;
ka dok gurwako tol jabu aryo-nu odonyo i agit aryo ma gitye i dog kicaa kor-ri.
Gumwono dog tol aryo-nu ducu i kom gin lakwak tere aryo ma giŋweko ki dironi, gutweyo kwede i kom gin wi gwok me epod.
Dok gutimo agit aryo me jabu, ci gukwoyogi i twok kicaa kor aryo ducu, i doge ma tuŋ iye ma cok ki epod.
Ci gutimo agit me jabu aryo gukubogi i gin wi gwok epod aryo anyim tuŋ tere, ka ma okubbe tuŋ malo i wi ceme me epod ma gicweyo ki diro-ni.

Ci gutweyo kicaa kor ki agitte i kom agit ma i dog epod ki tol ma bulu, wek obut opyelle i kom ceme me epod ma gicweyo ki diro-ni, wek kicaa kor pe ogonnye woko ki i kom epod; macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Dok otimo jor me epod ma gicweyo kome ducu ki uci ma bulu.
Otuco dog jor obedo twolo macalo dog boŋo aruka, ma gidolo doge orumo woko likiŋ wek pe oyeci.
I dog jor guluno iye gin muporo okwer pomegranat munyak, ma gikwoyo ki uci ma bulu, ki ma lamar lamar, ki makwar, ki boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre.
Dok gutimo olaŋ me jabu ma giliyo maber, ci gikwoyo olaŋ giŋobo kin okwer pomegranat orumo dog jor woko, oŋobo kin okwer pomegranat ducu;
olaŋ ki okwer pomegranat orumo dog jor ducu kun gigwennye agwenya, i dog jor me aruka i dog tic; macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Dok gutimo kanyi ma gicweyo ki boŋo camanini maberre, ki pali me boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre, pi Aron ki awobene,
ki kitambara me adwala i wic me boŋo camanini maberre ki gitok matino me boŋo camanini maberre, ki pali me boŋo camanini ma giwiyo maberre,
ki k itambara me latwe pyer me boŋo camarum ma giwiyo maberre, ki uci ma bulu, ki ma lamar lamar, ki makwar, ma gidero maber; macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Dok gutimo akwaya jabu me lalukana maleŋ ki jabu ma giliyo maber, gigoro kome macalo agora i kom agit ni, “Maleŋ pi Rwot.”
Gutweyo tol ma bulu i kome wek gitwe girid kwede i kom kitambara adwala me wic-ci; macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Yam gutyeko tic i kom kema, en kema me rwatte, kit meno; jo Icrael gutyeko tic ducu macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses; gutimo kit meno.
Gukelo kema bot Moses, kema ki jami ticce ducu, lwak golle ki gutine ki riine wirre ki tedi tergi;
laa nyogi romi ma ginyoŋo, kicika me laumme;
canduk lok me caden, ki tal latiŋŋe, ki kom me kica;
meja ki jami ticce ducu, ki mugati me aketa i nyim Lubaŋa;
okar-mac me jabu ma giliyo maber, ki lwak laputte ma giketo malo i wiye, ki jami ticce ducu, ki moo me mac;
ke no tyer me jabu, moo me wir, ki odok eceta ma ŋwece kur, ki boŋo laum doggola me kema;
keno tyer me mola, ki tal latiŋŋe, ki jami ticce ducu; otako lwok ki tedi tere;
boŋo cuka me aŋaba me rumo dyekal, wirre ki tedi tergi ki boŋo laum doggaŋ me d yekal, ki lwak tol lacikgi ki lwak teke lagurgi; jami me tic kwedgi i kema, pi kema me rwatte;
ki boŋŋi aruka ma gitiyo mabeco me tic i kabedo maleŋ, boŋŋi aruka maleŋ pi ajwaka Aron, ki boŋŋi aruka pi awobene pi ticgi me bedo ajwagi.
Macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses, jo Icrael gutiyo gutyeko tic ducu kit meno.
Moses oneno tic ducu, ci nen, gutiyo tic kikome; macalo Rwot onoŋo ociko, gutiyo tic ducu kakare. Ci Moses olamo gum i komgi.
Rwot owaco bot Moses ni,
“I nino dwe acel i dwe mukwoŋo, cak guro iye kema, en kema me rwatte.
Ket iye canduk lok me caden, ci iŋab boŋo kicika me laum kom canduk.
Ka doŋ iter iye meja, ican iye jami ducu kikore, ka dok ikel okar-mac ci icib laput malo i wiye.
Dok iket keno tyer me jabu me waŋo odok eceta i nyim canduk lok me caden, ci iŋab boŋo cuka laum doggola me kema.
Ket keno tyer me gitum awaŋa i nyim doggola me kema, en kema me rwatte;
iket otako lwok ocuŋ i kin kema me rwatte ki keno tyer, ci iony iye pii.
Dok iŋab boŋo cuka me dyekal irum woko ducu, ci iŋab boŋo cuka me laum doggaŋ me dyekal.
Kwany moo wir, iwir ki kema ki lwak jami ducu ma gitye iye, kun ikwero en ki jami ma giketo iye ducu gubed maleŋ.
Dok bene wir keno tyer me gitum awaŋa ki moo, ki jami ticce ducu; kwer keno tyer, ci bidoko maleŋ makato.
Wir moo bene i kom otako lwok ki tedi tere ikwergi.
Ka doŋ ibikelo Aron ki awobene i doggola kema me rwatte, ci ilwok komgi ki pii.
Ka doŋ iruk Aron ki boŋŋi aruka maleŋ, ci iwire ki moo, ikwere wek oti bo ta tic me ajwaka.
Ka dok ikel awobene bene, irukgi ki kanyi,
iwirgi ki moo macalo iwiro wongi-ni, wek guti bota tic me ajwagi: wirogi ki moo bimiyo gibedo ajwagi matwal wa i kare pa likwayogi ducu.”
Moses otimo kit meno kit ma yam Rwot ocike kwede ducu; otimo ducu kit meno.
I dwe mukwoŋo, i mwaka me aryone, i nino dwe mukwoŋo aye giguro iye kema.
Moses oguro kema: oryeyo tedi tere; ocibo iye guti, ka orwako iye rii bao, oilo wir malo.
Ka dok oyaro boŋo opeto i wi kema, oketo laum kema, opeto i wiye, macalo yam Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Ka dok otero lok me caden oketo i canduk, ka orwako tal i kor canduk, oketo kom me kica i wi canduk;
ka otero canduk i kema, oŋabo boŋo kicika malo me laumme, ci oumo kom canduk lok me caden woko, macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Ka dok oketo meja i kema me rwatte, i kema tuŋ acam, ki woko i ŋe boŋo kicika ma oumo canduk-ki
ka dok ocano mugati i nyim Rwot macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Ka dok oketo okar-mac i kema me rwatte tuŋ acuc me kema kun okemme ki meja,
ka ocibo laput malo i nyim Rwot; macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Ka dok oketo keno tyer me jabu i kema me rwatte i nyim boŋo kicika,
ci owaŋo odok eceta ma ŋwece kur i wiye; macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Dok oŋabo boŋo cuka me laum doggola me kema.
Ka dok oketo keno tyer me gitum awaŋa cok ki doggola kema me rwatte, ka ocako tyero iye gitum awaŋa, ki gityer me moko kwon; macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Ka dok oketo otako lwok i kin kema me rwatte ki keno tyer, oonyo iye pii me lwok;
en aye ka ma Moses ki Aron ki awobene gilwoko iye tyengi.
Ka gicito i kema me rwatte, dok ka ginyiko cok ki keno tyer, ci gilwokke, macalo Rwot ociko ki Moses.
Oguro dyekal orumo kema ki keno tyer, ci oŋabo boŋo cuka laum doggaŋ me dyekal, Kit meno Moses otyeko tic kakare.
Lacen pol obino, oumo wi kema me rwatte woko, ci deyo pa Rwot opoŋo i kema.
Moses onoŋo pe twero donyo i kema me rwatte, pien pol oboyo kom kema me rwatte woko, dok deyo pa Rwot opoŋo i kema.
I kare me wotgi ducu, ka pol owarre woko ki i wi kema, ci jo Icrael gicako wot anyim;
ento ka pol pe owarre woko, ci pe gimedde ki wotgi anyim, gikuro nio i nino ma owarre woko.
I kare me wotgi ducu pol pa Rwot umo wi kema dyeceŋ, ki mac bedo iye dyewor, ma kun jo ducu me ot pa Icrael gineno.
